basics.label: Driver, Relation Officer, Translator, Legal and Cultural Advisor, Case Researcher, English Instructor
basics.summary: A passionate and dedicated professional with more than five years of experience in the fields of law, linguistics and interpretation.

work.name: Various Companies
work.position: Driver, Relation Officer, Translator, Legal and Cultural Advisor, Case Researcher, English Instructor
work.summary: Worked in various positions from teaching English as a second language, providing legal advice, translating for military personnel to driving.
highlights: Provided legal aid to civil societies, government organizations, and impoverished community members on issues of child abuse.
Translated confidential government/military documents, while maintaining exceptional levels of confidentiality.
Taught conversational and written English to second language learners.

languages.fluency: Fluent in English, Pashto, Daro, and have advanced speaking abilities in Hindi.
